price: Ҳамоно Мо роҳро ба ӯ нишон додем, хоҳ сипосгузор бошад ё носипос
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
